This app demonstrates the comprehensive usage of `navset_bar` with the following features:

1. Title: "Sales Dashboard"
2. ID: "sales_dashboard" for tracking selected nav item
3. Default selected panel: "overview"
4. Sidebar with date range and product selection
5. Header with descriptive text
6. Footer with copyright notice
7. Background color: primary
8. Inverse text color: False
9. Underline active nav item: True
10. Collapsible on mobile: True
11. Fluid layout: True
12. Multiple nav panels with icons:
    - Overview (pie chart icon)
    - Trends (line chart icon)
    - Comparative (bar chart icon)
13. Nav menu with "More" dropdown
14. Synthetic sales data generation
15. Interactive plots and data tables
16. Reactive filtering based on date range and product selection

The app provides a comprehensive example of using `navset_bar` with various parameters and creating an interactive, data-driven dashboard.

## Installation and Execution
```bash
pip install shiny matplotlib pandas
```

Run the app by saving the script and executing:
```bash
shiny run app.py
```

## Package Dependencies
- shiny
- matplotlib
- pandas
- numpy
